document.docAuthor: CHATTERJEE, TAPAS, KOTOV, ALEXEY A., DAMME, KAY VAN, CHANDRASEKHAR, S. V. A. & PADHYE, SAMEER
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the Cladocera (Crustacea: Branchiopoda) from India

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the Cladocera (Crustacea: Branchiopoda) from India

subSubSection.paragraph:
Indian records. Andaman & Nicobar Islands — Venkataraman (1991b , 1992d , 2000a ); Andhra Pradesh — Subbamma (1992 , 1993 ), Chandrasekhar & Kodarkar (1994) , Chandrasekhar (1994, 1998b, 2004a, 2010),
Malathi et al. (1998)
; Assam — Biswas (1980) , Sharma B.K. et al. (2000), Sharma S. (2008b), Sharma B.K. & Sharma S. (2008 a, b); Bihar — Brehm (1950) , Verma & Duttamunshi (1983), Venkataraman & Nandi (1997) , Sharma B.K. & Sharma S. (2001); Delhi — Arora & Mehra (2009) ; Goa— Rane (2008) ; Haryana —Michael & Sharma B.K. (1988); Jammu & Kashmir— Raina & Vass (1993) ,
Siraj et al. (2006
, 2007); Jharkhand — Venkataraman & Nandi (1997) , Chandrasekhar & Chatterjee (2008) ; Karnataka — Brehm (1953) , Raghunathan (1988) , Patil & Goudhar (1988), Raghunathan & Suresh Kumar (2007) ; Kerala —Michael & Sharma B.K. (1988); Kerala — Raghunathan (1989) , Subash Babu & Nayar (2004) , Subhash Babu & Thomas (2007) ; Madhya Pradesh — Mahor (2011) ; Maharashtra — Rane (2002 , 2004 , 2005b , 2006 , 2009 ),
Pawar et al. (2003)
, Pawar & Pulle (2005) , Jayabhaye & Madlapure (2006) ,
Deshpande et al. (2007)
,
Kamble et al. (2007)
, Gaikwad et al. (2008), Waghmare & Lokhande (2009) , Jayabhaye (2010) ,
Ghantaloo et al. (2011)
; Manipur —Sharma B.K. & Sharma S. (2009a); Meghalaya —Sharma S (2010a, b); Punjab—Michael & Sharma B.K. (1988), Battish & Kumari (1982) ; Rajasthan — Biswas (1971) , Sharma R. et al. (2011), Sharma V. et al. (2012); Tamil Nadu — Brehm (1936) , Michael (1973) , Murugan & Job (1981) , Raghunathan (1983, 1990, 1991), Michael & Sharma B.K. (1988), Venkataraman (1995a, 1999), Raghunathan & Revathi (1999a , c), Revathi & Raghunathan (1999), Isaiarasu (1999) , Raghunathan & Suresh Kumar (2002 , 2009),
Kudari et al. (2005)
,
Usha et al. (2006)
, Raghunathan & Valarmathi (2007) ,
Mohideen et al. (2008)
, Kanagasabapathi & Rajan (2010) , Dheenadayalamoorty & Sultana (2011), Devi & Ramanibai (2012) ,
Prabhakar et al. (2012)
; Tripura —Venkataraman (1995b), Venkataraman & Das (2000) ; Uttarakhand —
Mishra et al. (2010)
; West Bengal —Sharma B.K. (1978); Michael & Sharma B.K. (1988), Venkataraman (1993b) , Venkataraman & Nandi (1997) , Bilgrami (1991a) , Sinha & Khan (2000) , Venkataraman & Das (2001) ,
Venkataraman et al. (2000)
, Chandrasekhar & Chatterjee (2002) , Khan (2003) ,
Mukhopadhyay et al. (2007)
, Ganesan & Khan (2008) , Chattopadhyay & Barik (2009) ,
Patra et al. (2011)
; General record— Fernando & Kanduru (1984) , Sharma B.K. & Michael (1987),
Murugan et al. (1998)
; Raghunathan & Suresh Kumar (2003) .

Remarks. Valid species described from Czech Republic ( Kurz 1874 ). Worlwide this is a complex of cryptic species (
Petrusek et al. 2004
). Note that Indian populaions described by Michael & Sharma B.K. (1988) belong to
M. micrura dubia
in understanding of Smirnov (1976) .

Moina dodhui Rane, 1987
is a junior synonym of
M. micrura
(see Sharma B.K. & Sharma S. 1990). “
Moina dubia
” from West Bengal — Swell (1935) ; Tamil Nadu — Brehm (1936) , Bihar — Brehm (1950) , Karnataka — Brehm (1953) , Rajasthan — Biswas (1971) belongs also to
Moina micrura Kurz, 1874
(see Michael & Sharma B.K. 1988).

Biology of this species was studied by Murugan (1975a , 1989 ), Jana & Pal (1985b , c), Punia (1988) ,
Thresimma et al. (1991)
, Jana & Chakrabarti (1993) , Altaff & Sivakumar (2002) , Sumita & Ramanibai (2003) and Subhash Babu & Nandan (2010) .
Distribution. Widely distributed in tropics and subtropics, southern Europe.

Moina micrura dubia
see
M. dubia
